title: WTB: PSA 4 Non-Piedmont or Sweet Cap Backs
author: bundy462

posts.post_title: WTB: PSA 4 Non-Piedmont or Sweet Cap Backs
posts.post_content:
If anyone has any PSA 4 HOFers, Gandil, Cicotte, Burns, or Chase in any back other than PM or SC, I'm interested.

I have other PSA 4 graded HOFers, some SL raw beaters, or cash available.

Thanks!

Hi Jeff,

Have these two available in Polar Bear backs - willing to consider trades but also posted prices for straight-up sale.  (price includes PayPal fees and shipping).

Brown - Chicago shirt - Polar Bear back ($225)
[IMG]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-pFV411nCEAY/TkieYAg3-HI/AAAAAAAAMow/eWxKt1SeNmk/s640/T206%2520Brown%252C%2520Mordecai%2520%2528Chicago%2520shirt%2529%2520%25282%2529%2520-%2520front.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-VU3o931fJIk/TkieYYeiSDI/AAAAAAAAMo4/o81HxaCedu8/s640/T206%2520Brown%252C%2520Mordecai%2520%2528Chicago%2520shirt%2529%2520%25282%2529%2520-%2520rear.jpg[/IMG]

Chase - portrait blue - Polar Bear back ($110)
[IMG]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-UHJ873Pmxo4/Tkiej8adKLI/AAAAAAAAMus/LZXAFd3nVFw/s640/T206%2520Chase%2520%2528portrait%252C%2520blue%2529%2520-%2520front.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-Gve139oG0lU/TkiekG2MMXI/AAAAAAAAMu4/zJtWQWF3q2Y/s640/T206%2520Chase%2520%2528portrait%252C%2520blue%2529%2520-%2520rear.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks,
--S

The Brown in a Polar Bear is the ONLY HOFer I have in a non-SC or non-PM back!  I didn't even bother listing this exception because I figured the chances of hitting it were not good.  Figures!

Thank you Shaun for your reply, it is much appreciated.

Also only looking for PSA at the moment on the Chase.
Picked up a few Polar Bears.  Any other backs out there in a PSA 4?
